Fahari Mango Smoothie

Fahari Mango • 2

Silky mango smoothie.

drinkbreakfast

Ingredients

Tap to flip
  • 1 cup Fahari Mango yoghurt
  • 1 cup diced mango
  • 1/2 cup milk
  • Ice
